answerText: Huldrych Zwingli [or Ulrich Zwingli][10] Zwingli, Bullinger, and this theologian hashed out their differences on the Lord's Supper at the Consensus Tigurinus. This author of the Institutes of the Christian Religion names a doctrine in which God predestined some people to be saved.
heading: DEES |2014 | Penn A | 4 | Religion | None | College
subject: Religion
question: Question: This theologian and Martin Luther met at the Marburg Colloquy, where this man argued against the Real Presence.  [10] Name this Protestant reformer, a pastor at the Grossm√ºnster in Zurich who was succeeded by Heinrich Bullinger. He first provoked controversy by attacking Lenten fasting and later fought with Catholic cantons in the Kappel Wars.
